title: Disability benefits due to mental disorders up 38 percent in Brazil
description:
Data from the Social Security Ministry shows that the number of sick pay and retirement benefits due to mental and behavioral disorders in Brazil grew by 38 percent last year, to a total of 288,865. The volume is greater than in 2021, at the height of the Covid pandemic, when just over 200,000 benefits of […]

The post Disability benefits due to mental disorders up 38 percent in Brazil appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
